data.title: Los Monteros Villa for sale in Marbella Spain
data.meta_description: A super luxury villa for sale that comes with all the modern amenities to pamper you with luxury you need in. This villa stands out from other luxury property due to its charm, astonishing view of the sea and mountains in the surrounding. This home is creatively designed to provide each space with f
data.text:
Project Overview:

A beautifully designed and structured villa located near Los Monteros Estate, a residential locality and also on a beach side. The property itself is so beautiful that you will hate to come out of your house. Take a cup of tea or coffee in the early morning take a walk to your balcony and check out the amazing view of Beach or your private pool. Ample space for car parking and all the modern equipment, furniture, fixture used to provide you with a fantastic feeling of living your life to its fullest. The location is very famous and provide ease of access to all the major locations with loads of facilities in the vicinity.

Some advantages like the double height grand Entrance lobby, separate bathroom & toilets for guest, Modern Kitchen with Sile stone counters and dining area. It also has access to the front entrance courtyard, living room and the pool area. Everything here is thoughtfully designed and Each space here is spacious no matter if its Main hall room, Kitchen, Bedrooms, Bathrooms, car park, private garden or Swimming pool. Nothing is less then a king size home.

Specifications :

Vitrified tiles

Designer sanitary fittings

Concealed plumbing

Granite platform

Stainless steel sink

Drying and washing areas

Quality painting

Advanced electrical system

Modular switches

Earthquake resistance

Fire Fight Equipments

Fire Alarm

Security Alarm

Amenities :
